page.title: 01HOUSING - MAULDEN AREA
page.content: This block contains the small hamlets of{Haynes West End}and{Water End,}as well as the larger village of{Maulden. Originally, we think{Maulden}was a green village, because evidence of a village green is still visable, but it now resembles a linear development. The main industries are related to farming and market gardening, although there is some light industry. {Traffic}problems through the village have improved since the opening of the by-pass in l983. There are regular, if infrequent,{bus services}to the nearby towns of AMPTHILL and BEDFORD, and the M1 MOTORWAY. The{residents}of the area were interviewed about their views on life locally and were in general very sat- isfied with facilities, although some stressed the need for local{medical {care.}
